reviewText: As a player, Scott Lee is a joke!  I could spot him the 3 ball and beat him one handed.  Presentation is decent but lacks credibility coming from an unaccomplished player.
A lot of good pointers.  Recommended for everyone.

I thought it was good and informative.
Best, was the breakdown on stroke .
I think covered fundementals very well.
I chose this rating because the instruction was clear and understandable. I was able to decipher their instructions and put it to use on the pool table.
This video has enough information to start on your way to better pool.  Suggest you watch more than once so you can remember what to do.
